publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2251 Pauline McNeill: Congratulations to President Abbas—That the Parliament congratulates Mahmoud Abbas on his election to the office of President of the Palestinian people; supports the reports of international observers that the elections for the leader of the Palestinian Authority were free and fair; believes that President Abbas has a strong mandate for peace in the Middle East; urges the Israeli Government to negotiate peace with, and justice for, the Palestinians and withdrawal from the occupied territories, and further calls on the international community to do all that it can to support a peaceful settlement, the return of humanitarian rights to the Palestinian people and the establishment of a viable Palestinian state.

S2M-2251 Pauline McNeill: Congratulations to President Abbas—That the Parliament congratulates Mahmoud Abbas on his election to the office of President of the Palestinian people; supports the reports of international observers that the elections for the leader of the Palestinian Authority were free and fair; believes that President Abbas has a strong mandate for peace in the Middle East; urges the Israeli Government to negotiate peace with, and justice for, the Palestinians and withdrawal from the occupied territories, and further calls on the international community to do all that it can to support a peaceful settlement, the return of humanitarian rights to the Palestinian people and the establishment of a viable Palestinian state.
S2M-2251 Congratulations to President Abbas (lodged on 13 January 2005) Margaret Jamieson*
S2M-2251 Congratulations to President Abbas (lodged on 13 January 2005) Maureen Macmillan*, Michael Matheson*, Susan Deacon*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-2251 Congratulations to President Abbas (lodged on 13 January 2005) Bill Butler*
S2M-2251 Congratulations to President Abbas (lodged on 13 January 2005) Sarah Boyack*
S2M-2251 Congratulations to President Abbas (lodged on 13 January 2005) Irene Oldfather*
S2M-2251 Congratulations to President Abbas (lodged on 13 January 2005) Mike Pringle*, Elaine Smith*
S2M-2251 Congratulations to President Abbas (lodged on 13 January 2005) Marlyn Glen*, Mr John Home Robertson*, Linda Fabiani*
